subtitle: When a bird is born it grows and it naturally learns how to take its first flight, how to
hunt, how to build a nest, how to survive... bees too inherently know how to pollinate the planet and
create honey all animals in the animal kingdom have a specific skill and purpose to which they
fulfill perfectly in general part of an animal's purpose is to learn about survival this part of
life in the evolution of a soul is known as the Animal Kingdom on the next level of Consciousness
is the Human Kingdom - at this level the purpose is not the same as an animal yet this is how most of
Humanity's way of Being is orientated; struggling for survival, this is not the purpose of what it
means to be human and when we live like that we live spiritually no different to animals. In this
way, much of what we see in the animal kingdom on this planet is a reflection of the vast animal-like
human psyche, or in other words: ego. The ey the false sense of me the illusory sense of
identity the real purpose of what it means to be human is to Awaken Consciousness... to
transcend the limitations of our animal nature to embark on the path of self-realization and
Spiritual Development which goes far beyond the instinctual drive for survival... your
purpose is to realize the divine nature within yourself–your sacred connection
to all that is—that is why you are here, to awaken to the higher dimensions of cosmic
intelligence... to become like man in the image of God rather than man in the image of an
animal when we reflect on what ego is is we can find insights when we understand that its
nature is parallel to different types of animals depending on the different types
of egos this is because in previous lives in the evolution of our soul we lived through
existences in the mineral Kingdom then in the vegetable or plant kingdom then
the animal kingdom and finally in the human Kingdom the problem is we do not intimately
understand the purpose of what it means to exist in the human Kingdom because almost all
of our Consciousness is still submerged and attached to our animal nature our lower ego
nature on the surface in the physical world we look like humans but in the light of the astral
plane in the light of the inner worlds it is common for us to appear as or symbolically
reflect as animals and if we are on the path of self transformation our animal nature may also
transform into different types of animals as we progress until one day we no longer
represent animals and finally reflect our True Divine Essence our real human nature this is
why various traditions in the past have something called spirit animals which was a way for the wise
people of a community to teach certain individuals about their own nature and this is the reason as
to why there are many children's stories Stories books and movies about animals who act and talk
like humans because we subconsciously understand this spiritual truth within ourselves
it's important to note that while this truth does exist in our internal worlds
it is still a level of Illusion within us and these symbolic representations are not
meant to condemn our ego animal nature but but rather to illustrate and reflect on the
negative aspects of our own psychological States and to understand the ego in a way
that is not usually considered that it is not just like some mental mechanical robot
but that it is more similar to an animal the key to spiritual growth lies in transforming
or transmuting our Deep ego-driven Emotions into their positive counterparts through
self-observation self-reflection and inner work when an aspect of our lower animal
psyche dissolves within us it gives birth to something new a higher form of Consciousness
this is a gradual process that takes time and thus recalling past lives also takes
time when we were children we had far more inner potential to access the memories of
our past lives however due to the conditioning from society, culture,
parents, school, technology, children's attention quickly becomes attached to
the external senses blocking the development of the inner senses and further when puberty
initiates so too does the force of one's psyche and Karma begin to intensify and
unfortunately without spiritual guidance it is all too easy for us to get lost as we grow into
adulthood this is how 99% of the population lives we keep being born into multiple lives without
knowing the purpose of our existence we waste time and precious energy chasing futile desires
of career material possessions relationships status security sex none of those things are
wrong they are part of life but it is our attachment and identification to them that
keeps our Consciousness asleep however when one redirects their focus away from the horizontal
dimension of time and directs it inwards towards the vertical aspect of their being then one can
begin to illuminate their inner workings their own nature and Attain Self-knowledge and with
self-knowledge one can begin to understand the causes for why they have their own particular
psychological dispositions why they go through certain dramas in life why they have certain
desires and attachments why their relationships are the way they are why their karma is the
way it is this is all intimately related to actions that were made in previous existences
our karma is the accumulated effects of inner psychological causes that were born in previous
lives if you want to remember your past lives there are two principles first to understand
and reflect on both in meditation and in daily life we first have to understand what condition
our Consciousness is currently in in a precise way observe this diagram we all have Consciousness, our
Consciousness in its fully liberated enlightened state is pure pure light the Divine spark it is
100% pure Essence which is profoundly connected to the highest dimensions of existence and of
understanding but our Consciousness is not in this state it is not 100% awakened for the average
person their Consciousness is made up of 3% awakened Essence and 97% Ego we cannot grow
spiritually we cannot awaken our Consciousness and we cannot remember our past lives as long
as we do not comprehend our ego nature this is why we do not remember our past lives because
our Consciousness is asleep because our ego that lives in our unconscious has taken over
our perception our thoughts our feelings our existence remember we are not condemning the
ego we are not making it our enemy we are here to comprehend it to acquire self-realization
so our ego or egos the multiplicity of our psychological state is the reason why we do
not know who we are where we came from or what to do if we did we would remember the memories
of our past lives we would know where we came from what we experienced in the past and what
our purpose is in this life and what we have to achieve spiritually Here and Now now everything
talked about in this video can be boiled down to this genuinely authentically dissolve the ego and
you will remember your past lives because our ego holds the memories of our past lives the memories
of our past lives are bottled up in unconscious psychological pth patterns that we do not yet
see let us understand this more intimately our ego is a separate sense of self it is made up
of psychological entities that live within the vast space of our inner world inhabiting
the space of our consciousness they have their own desires that control us and make
us unconscious and they continually repeat their negative thoughts in our psychological
space day to day, week to week, year to year and from Life To Life... egos are not just about very
negative behaviors or things that society would consider ethically wrong egos are also the very
small and minute details about our psychology about the very small things we think and feel
unconsciously throughout our day-to-day life these psychological ways of being these small patterns
that we have within us also have emotional and mental forms that can be perceived as actual
people or animals in the astral plane often when we have dreams of many random people or strangers
or creatures they are actually representing our own psychological crowd they appear like
this symbolically in dreams because they remain in our unconscious ambiguous awareness they are
hidden camouflaged in the veil of ignorance in the veil of lack of self-knowledge as long as
the hidden parts of our psyche remain unseen they continue to exist and persist within us
for example an ego of anger May manifest in a man once a week and make the atmosphere
of his family's house very low and fearful the negative psychological mood of this particular
ego ego possesses the physical body of the man and fulfills its unconscious desire to cause
chaos arguments problems if the man cannot control this or stop this from happening it
means that he does not comprehend it he does not know this part of himself and it will continue
to manifest mechanically week to week month to month life to life as long as it remains
unobserved but if this man sincerely took up spiritual practice in a serious way he may
encounter in the astral plane this particular ego of anger which may appear as a creature an animal
or even a man who looks identical to himself in this experience if his Consciousness is awake in
those moments he would be able to go and ask this ego what is the reason for its existence
and he may receive an interesting answer we cannot overcome ego by reading books about
it or taking advice from others we can only truly comprehend it by truly observing ourselves deeply
and intimately because the answers for really understanding ourselves remain within ourselves
and to do this it doesn't just have to happen through astral projection but that
is just an example or a reflection of how our meditative process can work when we are truly
on this journey of transformation through this type of psychological investigation
we are able to gradually comprehend our unconsciousness and combined with
meditation and transmutation we are able able to transcend and dissolve lower aspects of our
being reflect back on this diagram 3% Essence 97% ego if ego were not there there would be
100% Essence 100% awakened Consciousness to free up even just 1% or 2 % of essence if an
individual could possess even just 5% or 10% Essence this person will possess an enormous
amount of self-realization and will begin to have spiritual experiences all of our hidden
powers of the Soul such as telepathy omniscience astral projection Clairvoyance control over our
life are all hidden within our conditioned trapped Essence but the essence is being used
by ego this is why the ego has such tremendous power over our lives and the world because it is
using the Divine powers of our soul which is our Essence to give itself life and existence and to
feed its desires it is our Essence which keeps the ego alive... attachment fuels ego -- it uses our
divine human capacities to manifest its own desires leading even more of our Essence to
suffering confusion unfulfillment greed fear Etc this is karma ego unconsciously
manifesting but again let us be careful not to condemn our unconsciousness but instead
to take responsibility for what we hold within in this way it is not entirely true that egos
are a totally separate sense of self that they are totally separate from us and this is why we
should never judge them because the deeper truth is that they are an intimate part of
ourselves because they are using our Essence our Consciousness which remains bottled up inside it
Essence is trapped in ego waiting to be liberated through self-realization just as a thief steals
from us we have to learn to steal steal it back like hunting down Pirates to receive back our
stolen Treasures this is the meaning of in order to ascend we have to descend descend into the
world of our conditioning in order to shed light on what we do not see and we do that through
self-observation and meditation so the point of this teaching is which you may realize for
yourself already if you've been reflecting enough deeply that if you dissolve a particular cause of
a desire meaning if you liberate a particular unconscious psychological pattern if you truly
free yourself from it if you truly transcend it then you will extract self-realization from it
and consequently, you will naturally begin to remember your past lives because within that
particular ego within the particular part of your psyche that you have liberated holds the memory
of when it fulfilled its desires in its past lives: ego holds the memories of our past
lives... now keeping in mind this understanding of our Consciousness as ego and Essence
towards our past lives let us introduce the understanding of the personality and the physical
body each person holds ego Essence a physical body and personality when we die the physical body and
the personality die the ego and the essence do not die we carry our ego and our Essence from
life to life in conventional understanding we may write ly assume that our ego was a result of our
upbringing as children but the deeper truth is the esoteric truth is that the external
manifestations of our life is simply a reflection of our internal Karma it would be great if our
ego died when our physical body dies but it does not remember that in our conditioned State ego
is part of our Essence and our Essence is part of the vertical Eternal aspect of our being and
the ego is a conditioned negative aspect of our own Eternal nature this is why it is said hell is
eternal suffering that does not mean that hell last forever but it means that it will last as
long as our attachment to it remains as long as ego remains this is why it is said throughout many
teachings including the beliefs of the ancient Egyptians that we must learn how to die before
we die if we truly want everlasting life that means to know how to die internally to our own
self or false sense of self our ego we carry the same egos through each life what goes to
the grave is personality and the physical body our ego and Essence remains as part of our nonphysical
Consciousness our ego lives through all of our past personalities personality is simply
the outward expression of the internal makeup of our Consciousness in each life we are born
into there are similarities in our personality -- but generally speaking each personality is different
because in each life we are born into different conditions cultures appearances and sometimes as
a different gender the way we feel about the conditions of each life is different and that
forms our outer personality but the Egos and the particular Essence Remains the Same more or less
more or less because the idiosyncrasy of our ego psychology can shift and transform especially if
we go through enough pain and suffering in certain lives and if we have enough Spirit or willpower
to change ourselves for example a criminal who suffered dire consequences from his actions in his
previous life may have a strong desire not to be a criminal in his next life that's his personality
that's his personal choice on the Sur surface layer of his life however that does not mean
that he has dissolved egos that want to commit crimes still and internally even though he may
seem like a normal man it is still likely that he suffers from certain dark thoughts or Temptations
so on the surface his personality his Persona outwardly will appear differently to his previous
life when someone dies without having achieved self-realization usually that person will soon
enter into another womb and into circumstances that can facilitate their karma this is why we
should pay very careful attention to the scenes of our life our life is a movie to be understood if
we do not understand why our life has turned out the way it has then we will keep repeating the
same experiences until we do this is why the Greek philosopher Socrates said the unexamined life is
not worth living most people do not examine their life because they blame external circumstances
or people to solely blame others or external circumstances for the cause of all our misery
and negative occurrences is an illusion what we experience in this life is according to Karma
and in each life this Karma repeats itself as long as we remain blind to it we must learn to
be genuinely interested and curious in observing our life deeply in order to be liberated from it
this is why in the Bhagavad Gita Krishna said; "The fire of self-knowledge Burns all Karma to
ashes"... our recurring lives is our Karma; this is called the law of recurrence which means in each
life the ego repeats its desires dramas emotions Ambitions etc, and it also repeats itself according
to the same people we meet at certain ages and at certain life events the scenes or impressions of
the external World simply trigger unconscious psychological states that already lay dormant
within us ego is never caused by external life but it simply awakens something that
was already within us simply put ego repeats its desires mechanically and as stated before
our ego is using our divine powers and it knows knows how to get us to enter another womb after
we die and it knows how to manifest the same dramas it compels us it compels our Essence
to come back again and again to exist in the physical world and repeat the same dramas again
and again this is called the law of return to keep returning through the cycle of death death
and birth in order to mechanically fulfill the law of recurrence the law of return is
the correct term for what happens to 99% of the population the term reincarnation points
to something else it points to when someone with awakened Consciousness a genuine Master
consciously decides to Incarnate into a physical body because they choose to from their own free
will we cannot say the same for ourselves because the average sleeping person does not choose to
Incarnate but they are controlled by the law of recurrence which our ego unconsciously submits us
to one of the main powers that the ego uses within us is of telepathy for example if an ego wants to
find a particular person to fight with it will telepathically find a corresponding person who
holds an ego that wants the corresponding type of fight or as another example if two people at
a particular age desire to get married they will telepathically find each other again at the same
age they did in their previous life in each life events happen desires of the ego are fulfilled at
the same age with the same people this is the law of recurrence the same dramas playing out
in the movies of our recurring lives and we are unconsciously being borne into this cycle through
the law of return the law of recurrence and the law of return point points to the Eternal and
cyclical nature of existence it points to the wheel of samsara which can also be symbolized
into this image of the Ouroborus an ancient symbol which depicts a serpent or Dragon devouring its
own taale forming a circle without beginning or end it signifies the Eternal cycle of birth death
and rebirth which is governed by the law of cause and effect Karma time in its Essence is circular
rather than linear and within this cyclical nature we find ourselves repeating the same patterns and
experiences until we awaken our Consciousness our repetitive existence is a consequence of
our unconsciousness and the mechanical nature of our actions and ways of being as long as our
Consciousness remains asleep we are bound to repeat the same mistakes and suffer the
same consequences of our past actions however through self-observation and self-knowledge
we can awaken our Consciousness and break free from this cycle of repetition by recalling and
learning from our past experiences in our past lives our intuition becomes vibrantly alive in
in imate comprehension of why we did what we did and how it also connects to our current Life by
remembering our past existences we can consciously choose a different path thus liberating ourselves
gradually from the wheel of recurrence the Ouroboros serves as a reminder of the need to
awaken our Consciousness and escape the repetitive patterns of existence and we can take our first
steps by remembering our past lives in part two we'll look at this wisdom more practically
and see the different meditation exercises you can do to remember your past lives for yourself
